name: Give Me the Light
description:
It's a cute small logical game with 100 levels, which can broke your brain. Are you ready to light up every lamp on each level?

Beatiful music and sound design included.  11 languages supported too. Also 87 achievements waiting for you. 

What are you waiting? This world needs you light.  And don't forget - mouse have right button too. 

Let's go! 

And the last thing. This game made with big love ^_^ from Siberia, Russia.
